description.ko: 지표면의 세밀한 탐구로, 건조한 지형의 가공되지 않은 아름다움과 자연적인 침식 및 광물 결정화로 형성된 복잡한 기하학적 패턴을 포착합니다.
description.en: A detailed exploration of the Earth's surface, capturing the raw beauty of arid terrain and the complex geometric patterns formed by natural erosion and mineral crystallization.

prompt: Ultra-realistic macro photography of dry, cracked earth texture with rich mineral veins, deep fissures, earthy tones of ochre and burnt sienna, top-down view, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, intricate details of soil erosion.
